Posts.Content: May 28, 2009 06:35PM Sunny719 wrote: nannieS---We are in the same place.  I had a mammogram that showed abnormalities--that was followed by another mammogram and ultra sound the same day.  Next I went back for an MRI.  That report showed that there is a strong suspicion of malignancy in both breasts.  I will see a surgeon on Tuesday.  I am sure that will just be a consultation.  Like you I am worried and anxious.  The unknown is miserable.  I want to know something for sure--know what will happen then--and get to it!  Do you have an appointment for the biopsy?
Posts.Title: ANOTHER MAMMOGRAM nannieS nannieS
